description: Expert-level integrated system design with thermal, EMI, and multi-domain optimization

problems.prompt: Space Telescope Cryocooler Power System: James Webb-class space telescope requiring ultra-stable cryocooler power for mid-infrared detectors
constraints: Cryocooler ripple current < 0.1% for detector stability
problems.application: James Webb-class space telescope requiring ultra-stable cryocooler power for mid-infrared detectors

problems.prompt: Hypersonic Vehicle Actuation Power System: Mach 6+ vehicle requiring power for control surface actuators during atmospheric re-entry
constraints: Actuator response < 10 ms for flight control
problems.application: Mach 6+ vehicle requiring power for control surface actuators during atmospheric re-entry

problems.prompt: Gravitational Wave Detector Seismic Isolation: LIGO-class detector requiring ultra-quiet power for seismic isolation actuators
constraints: Zero magnetic field emission (affects SQUID sensors)
problems.application: LIGO-class detector requiring ultra-quiet power for seismic isolation actuators

problems.prompt: Quantum Error Correction FPGA Power: Cryogenic FPGA array performing real-time quantum error correction requiring ultra-stable power
constraints: 50A load transient in 1 µs for error correction bursts
problems.application: Cryogenic FPGA array performing real-time quantum error correction requiring ultra-stable power

problems.prompt: Stellarator Magnet Trim Coil Supply: Wendelstein 7-X class stellarator requiring precision trim coil power for plasma shaping
constraints: Current accuracy ±10 ppm for magnetic field precision
Slew rate 1000 A/s for plasma position control
problems.application: Wendelstein 7-X class stellarator requiring precision trim coil power for plasma shaping

problems.prompt: Neuromorphic Chip Array Power Distribution: Large-scale neuromorphic computing cluster requiring per-chip power optimization
constraints: 8 power states for neural activity scaling
Load line droop 1 mΩ for spike response
0.1% voltage accuracy for neuron threshold stability
problems.application: Large-scale neuromorphic computing cluster requiring per-chip power optimization

problems.prompt: Directed Energy Weapon Capacitor Charger: High-energy laser system requiring rapid capacitor bank charging for pulse operation
constraints: Charge 500 kJ capacitor bank in 2 seconds
problems.application: High-energy laser system requiring rapid capacitor bank charging for pulse operation

problems.prompt: Deep Sea Mining ROV Power System: Abyssal zone ROV requiring power distribution at 6000m depth with extreme pressure
constraints: Tether voltage drop compensation over 6 km
Operate at 2°C ambient with efficient dissipation
problems.application: Abyssal zone ROV requiring power distribution at 6000m depth with extreme pressure

problems.prompt: Superconducting Maglev Propulsion Inverter: 600 km/h maglev train requiring propulsion power from superconducting linear motor
problems.application: 600 km/h maglev train requiring propulsion power from superconducting linear motor

problems.prompt: Muon Collider Kicker Magnet Pulser: Next-generation muon collider requiring ultra-fast kicker magnet pulsing for beam injection
constraints: 100 ns rise time for muon lifetime compatibility
problems.application: Next-generation muon collider requiring ultra-fast kicker magnet pulsing for beam injection
